column1: :Kochi pazhaya Kochi allenariyam pakshe Bilal pazhaya Bilal thanneya
:Ninney thookkaan ividathe niyamathinu bhayam aayirunnu....... marikkaan ninakkum.
:Maybe we’re poor.... coolies.... trolley pullers. But we’re not beggars
:Karnan Napoleon Bhagat Singh..... ivar moonu perumanente heroes
:Edaa CBI.... eda CBI...... irangy vaada ivide
:Irumbaani thatti molayaani vech... ponkarem kondu churika valakkan
:kollanu pathinaru panem koduthaven Chanthu. Mattem churika chodhichappol
